name: withReactivity
signature: (keys: readonly unknown[] | ReadonlyRecord<string, readonly unknown[]>) => <A extends Atom<any>>(atom: A) => A
description:
An alias to `Rx.runtime.withReactivity`, for refreshing an atom whenever the
keys change in the `Reactivity` service.
documentation:

keys change in the `Reactivity` service.
